Title: Hoots
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Kent Osborne, Andy Ristaino, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Tom Kenny, Kay Lenz
Plot: A charismatic stranger in Finn's dream leads Cosmic Owl to shirk his duties.
